pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:0.5: 40. The training rule on going wandering
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.2: At that time the nuns were staying right there at Rājagaha for the rainy season, for the cold season, and for the hot season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.4: “The districts are left dark and obscure by the nuns. They don’t brighten them up.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.7: who in turn told the Buddha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.8: Soon afterwards the Buddha gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.9: “Because of this, monks, I will lay down a training rule for the nuns for the following ten reasons:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.10: for the well-being of the Sangha …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.11: for the continuation of the true Teaching, and for supporting the training.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.12: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.13: ‘If a nun who has completed the rains residence does not go wandering, even if only 65 to 80 kilometers, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.5: Who has completed the rains residence:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.6: who has completed the first three or the last three months of the rainy season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.7: If she thinks, “I won’t go wandering, not even 65 to 80 kilometers,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.3: if she searches for a companion nun, but is unable to find one;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.8: The tenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.9: The fourth chapter on lying down is finished.
